Class FXZoomOnPinchSpreadPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.gef4.mvc.policies.AbstractPolicy<VR>
      • org.eclipse.gef4.mvc.policies.AbstractInteractionPolicy<javafx.scene.Node>
        • org.eclipse.gef4.mvc.fx.policies.FXZoomOnPinchSpreadPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAdaptable.Bound<IVisualPart<javafx.scene.Node,? extends javafx.scene.Node>>, IFXOnPinchSpreadPolicy, IPolicy<javafx.scene.Node>

    public class FXZoomOnPinchSpreadPolicy
extends AbstractInteractionPolicy<javafx.scene.Node>
implements IFXOnPinchSpreadPolicy
    An IFXOnPinchSpreadPolicy that performs zooming.

      • isZoom

        protected boolean isZoom(javafx.scene.input.ZoomEvent e)
        Returns whether the given ZoomEvent should trigger zooming. Per default, will always return true.
        Parameters:
        e - The ZoomEvent in question.
        Returns:
        true if the given ZoomEvent should trigger zoom, otherwise false.

      • zoom

        public void zoom(javafx.scene.input.ZoomEvent e)
        Description copied from interface: IFXOnPinchSpreadPolicy
        Continuous reaction to pinch (close fingers) gestures. Called continuously on finger movement, after the gesture has been detected, and before it has been finished.
        Specified by:
        zoom in interface IFXOnPinchSpreadPolicy
        Parameters:
        e - The original ZoomEvent.
